metadata.title: CVE-2022-46285 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libXpm. This issue occurs when parsing a file with acomment not closed; the end-of-file condition will not be detected, leadingto an infinite loop and resulting in a Denial of Service in the applicationlinked to the library.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxpm4 - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
xpmutils - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxpm package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
motif package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
